channel.title: Penn State University (R-002)

item.title: Discusses review of of Pennsylvania State Univ Research Reactor during ACRS 12th meeting on 550506.Recommends that Penn State be permitted to carry out program proposed.
item.author: NRC ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON REACTOR SAFEGUARDS (ACRS)
